message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR 

The paper proposes a method for matching images and sentences using convolutional neural networks. This involves image representation, word composition, and matching relations between the two modalities. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, since the method involves multimodal learning, multimedia (cs.MM) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, since the paper involves retrieval tasks, information retrieval (cs.IR) is also a possible sub-category.
